---
id: submit-redeem-script-for-staking-transaction
title: "Submit RedeemScript for Staking Transaction"
description: "Submit a RedeemScript so Core relayers can help transmit the staking transaction. This API is optional if the RedeemScript is already provided in the `op_return` field of the staking transaction."
sidebar_label: "Submit RedeemScript for Staking Transaction"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api:

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Submit RedeemScript for Staking Transaction"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/staking/helper/redeemscript"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Submit a RedeemScript so Core relayers can help transmit the staking transaction. This API is optional if the RedeemScript is already provided in the `op_return` field of the staking transaction.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

>
  
</RequestSchema>

</StatusCodes>
